comments.body: It looks like the lint rules for this package are disabled. Could you at least remove the line in the `tslint.json` file in this folder that says `dt-header: false` and fix any errors that come up? You are welcome to remove any other such line from the `tslint.json` file, though that might be a lot of work depending on what issues are being ignored. Thanks!
I believe I have now enabled the linting
